headline: Dominion Energy requests rate increase. Average residential bill would go up $20 per month.
summary: Jan. 5—AIKEN — Dominion Energy South Carolina has filed a rate increase request that would add about $20 to the average monthly bill of residential customers. The filing with the S.C. Public Service Commission was published on the agency's website Jan. 5. The company's last rate increase request was in 2024. If approved, the new rates would go into effect in July. Keller Kissam, president of ...
